dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The first LRT trains have actually arrived in Astana, which is a huge step forward for the city's public transport.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The first L R T trains have actually arrived in Astana, which is a huge step forward for the city's public transport.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first light rail transit (LRT) trains have arrived in Astana, the capital's akim (governor) Zhenis Kassymbek told journalists.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Zhenis Kassymbek, the akim, just announced that, right? Two trains arrived yesterday.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first light rail transit (LRT) trains have arrived in Astana, the capital's akim (governor) Zhenis Kassymbek told journalists. "Yesterday, the first two trains arrived.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And he mentioned they're aiming for a technical launch in September, with full passenger service by spring 2026.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And he mentioned they're aiming for a technical launch in September, with full passenger service by spring twenty twenty six.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the akim, the technical launch of the LRT system is scheduled for September this year, with full operation expected by spring 2026.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That timeline feels pretty ambitious, doesn't it? Like, they want testing done by the end of this year, but then commissioning takes months.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That timeline feels pretty ambitious, doesn't it? Like, they want testing done by the end of this year, but then commissioning takes months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh, he said three to six months for that phase. So if they start in September, um, early 2025 might be more realistic for testing completion?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh, he said three to six months for that phase. So if they start in September, um, early twenty twenty five might be more realistic for testing completion?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Then, as per regulations, commissioning work will take three to six months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he did say they hope to have passengers riding by the end of the first quarter, so maybe February or March.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he did say they hope to have passengers riding by the end of the first quarter, so maybe February or March.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our goal is to have passengers start using the service by the end of the first quarter," Kassymbek said on the sidelines of an event at the Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And all the trains should be delivered by the end of summer, which is goodâ€”no delays on that front, at least.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And all the trains should be delivered by the end of summer, which is good-no delays on that front, at least.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All trains are expected to be delivered by the end of the summer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I'm curious about the ticket price though. He mentioned earlier that they're still working that out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm curious about the ticket price though. He mentioned earlier that they're still working that out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Zhenis Kassymbek responded to a question about the possible cost of a single LRT ride.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, affordability is gonna be key for public uptake. Hopefully they keep it accessible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, affordability is gonna be key for public uptake. Hopefully they keep it accessible.

dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's a big investment, but Astana really needs this kind of infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's a big investment, but Astana really needs this kind of infrastructure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Connecting parts of the city with light rail could ease so much traffic.

dialogue_turns.text: And starting service in 2026 would be a major milestone. Fingers crossed the timeline holds.
